sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Box, Container, Typography, Grid, Button } from '@mui/material'; import './home.css'; const Home = ({ toggleSection }) => { return (
{/* Hero Section */} Welcome to Grace of God Ministries Empowering and transforming communities through faith and action {/* Explore Our Works Section */} toggleSection('projects')} > Explore Our Works {/* Our Story Section */} Our Story "Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you and learn from me, for I am gentle and humble in heart, and you will find rest for your souls. For my yoke is easy and my burden is light." Matthew 11:28-30 Grace of God Ministries was founded with the mission to bring hope and change to communities in need. Through our programs, we aim to provide education, health services, and spiritual guidance to those who need it most. Our story is one of faith, dedication, and a relentless pursuit of a better future for the vulnerable. {/* Vision and Mission Section */} Our Vision To see transformed communities where the love of Christ is demonstrated through practical help. Our Mission To serve the most vulnerable through faith-driven action, providing support in education, health, and spiritual care.
); }; export default Home;
